description: Introduction and Basics of RL, Markov Decision Processes (MDPs), Dynamic Programming, Monte Carlo Methods (Prediction), Temporal difference Methods (Prediction), Monte Carlo, TD Method (Control), Monte Carlo, TD Method (Control - cont.), N-step TD, EligibiJity Traces, Model based RL, (Action-)Value Function Approximation, Value Function Approximation, Policy Gradient, Policy Gradient, Misc. Topics.
name: AIL722 Reinforcement Learning
